short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Render Markdown content in a nicer way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you viewing Markdown content in Chrome?

The Beautify Markdown extension renders the raw Markdown content nicely for you. It gives you a nice and clean reading experience in the web browser.

You are able to:
1. switch between light and dark mode.
2. view outlines of the current Markdown content.

A classic use case is that, you can open the raw README.md document in a typical GitHub repository and use this extension to nicely render it.

It's especially useful when you share or present the Markdown document with your audience, for example in a video call.
